title: TIGI Rockaholic Dirty Secret Dry Shampoo, 6.3 Ounces(packaging may vary)

TIGI Rockaholic Dirty Secret Dry Shampoo comes to your rescue- your hair is going to look great with this agent. Less frequent shampooing Colorless formula Oil and odor absorbed at the roots It is a dry shampoo that holds a secret of less frequent shampooing. This near-to-colorless shampoo saves
